text: Just a quick note to say definitely take note of 503 statuses on the order stream if that is your method of tracking order status. Don’t place any bets otherwise statuses won’t get updated. And 503 on the order stream may happen independently from 503 on the market data stream.

elements.text: Just a quick note to say definitely take note of 503 statuses on the order stream if that is your method of tracking order status. Don’t place any bets otherwise statuses won’t get updated. And 503 on the order stream may happen independently from 503 on the market data stream.

text: so dont place any bets when you receive a 503 status, otherwise you might not get the relevant order back in the order stream?

elements.text: so dont place any bets when you receive a 503 status, otherwise you might not get the relevant order back in the order stream?

text:
Under these circumstances everyone’s pretty screwed unless you want to manually intervene. Placing an automated bet at SP might be an option though. 

Personally I just stop betting and see what the outcome is. Most of my strategies generally have positive expected value so I can let let it run. But I have quite a big bank so don’t need to worry too much about relatively big hits. 

There was a time when I would carry a laptop with me wherever I went in case of Betfair crashes, but I eventually settled on an attitude of “you win some you lose some”.

elements.text: Under these circumstances everyone’s pretty screwed unless you want to manually intervene. Placing an automated bet at SP might be an option though.

Personally I just stop betting and see what the outcome is. Most of my strategies generally have positive expected value so I can let let it run. But I have quite a big bank so don’t need to worry too much about relatively big hits.
There was a time when I would carry a laptop with me wherever I went in case of Betfair crashes, but I eventually settled on an attitude of “you win some you lose some”.

text: I think it mainly comes down to strategy bank size as youve said. just wondered as some of the strategies are not designed to be exposed at racetime

elements.text: I think it mainly comes down to strategy bank size as youve said. just wondered as some of the strategies are not designed to be exposed at racetime

text: Yeah, any strategy which has to close before the off to be profitable is always going to run the risk of exchange crashes. Presumably profit from when it’s working has to outweigh the risk that’s taken.

elements.text: Yeah, any strategy which has to close before the off to be profitable is always going to run the risk of exchange crashes. Presumably profit from when it’s working has to outweigh the risk that’s taken.
